body:
Even though it has only been up for like half an hour max, things i have noticed kinda messed up, people kept saying they lost levels lost kills lost deaths and there is no team chat.
I like the update just the maps drop my frame rate to 12 and thats pretty bad :p alot of people also said maps are laggy.

Leave anything you thought was kinda weird below :p

Thank You - SWAG

title: About Avicore.
